turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How can I be of assistance?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order us two pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay how many pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Three.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All three large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay what toppings did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's do one of them with pepperoni, the second one as a combination.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And do you know if Bella Lune has green chile as a topping?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It does but only on the Diablo Maxiums.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds good. I'll take one of those, too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so that's 3 large pizzas, one classic, one combo and one diablo maximus.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get all of those with a thick crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay no problem!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So with the thick crust it's going to cost $67.99.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Yes, that's okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your Pizza Will be ready in 30 minutes, enjoy!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thank you.
